Expected Result: Manager/ Customer successfully can view the customer balance enquiry successfully

Test Cases: Manager/ Customer can't submit the customer data while all the required fields is empty
Test Steps: 1) Don't enter a valid account number
Expected Result: An error message "Please fill all fields" must shown

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Submit" button

Test Cases: Manger/ Customer can reset the customer data
Test Steps: 1) Enter a valid account number
Expected Result: The account number entered must be deleted

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Reset" button

Test Cases: Nothing happen when clicking on reset button without entering any data in the account number field
Test Steps: 1) Don't enter any data in the account number field
Expected Result: All the account number field remains empty

Test Steps: 2) Click on the "Reset" button
